mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(v.qt_credito),0) as QT_CREDITO FROM venda v, credito cr WHERE v.id_credito = cr.id_credito AND v.id_usuario = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VENDA V ( V.ID_VENDA, V.ID_CREDITO, V.ID_USUARIO, V.QT_CREDITO, V.DT_VENDA ) VALUES ( VENDA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{credito.id}, #{usuario.id}, 1, SYSDATE )
